member.name: ID2D1DeviceContext5.CreateColorContextFromDxgiColorSpace
member.summary: Creates a color context from a DXGI color space type. It is only valid to use this with the Color Management Effect in 'Best' mode.
member.param: The color space to create the color context from.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1DeviceContext5.CreateColorContextFromSimpleColorProfile
member.summary: Creates a color context from a simple color profile. It is only valid to use this with the Color Management Effect in 'Best' mode.
member.param: The simple color profile to create the color context from.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1DeviceContext5.CreateColorContextFromSimpleColorProfile
member.summary: Creates a color context from a simple color profile. It is only valid to use this with the Color Management Effect in 'Best' mode.
member.param: The simple color profile to create the color context from.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1DeviceContext5.CreateSvgDocument
member.summary: Creates an SVG document from a stream.
member.param: An input stream containing the SVG XML document. If null, an empty document is created.
Size of the initial viewport of the document.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the created SVG document.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1DeviceContext5
member.summary: This interface performs all the same functions as the interface, plus it enables the creation of color contexts and Svg documents.
